description.p: STR 1, DEX 17, CON 10, INT 10, WIS 14, CHA 12
Features: Invisibility (1/rest), Guiding Glow (grant advantage on next attack within 10 ft.)
Attack: Glow Zap +5 to hit, 1d4 radiant
Features: Keen Sight, Mimicry, Alert Cry (ally gains +1 AC for 1 turn)
Features: Spellcasting (Charisma-based, spells like druidcraft, entangle, invisibility)
Root Bind: Grasp a creature (DC 12 Strength save or restrained for 1 round)
Regeneration: Recovers 5 HP at the start of each turn unless it took fire damage
Protective Roots: Nearby allies gain +1 AC
Features: Spore Cloud (DC 13 Con save or poisoned)
Pacify Spore (1/day): Target must make a DC 13 Wisdom save or be Charmed
Features: Keen Sight, Dive Bomb (add 1d6 damage when attacking from above)

Spellcasting: Can cast Barkskin, Goodberry, and Druidcraft
Features: Tree Stride, Charm Aura (DC 16), Greater Entangle
Spellcasting: Can cast Barkskin, Goodberry, Druidcraft
Regeneration: Recovers 10 HP at the start of each turn unless it took fire damage
Features: Spore Cloud (3d6 poison, DC 15 Con), Confusion Aura (DC 15)
Features: Mimicry, Stealthy, Distracting Caw (impose disadvantage on enemy attack roll)
Features: Smoke Trail (obscures vision in a 5-ft line), Ember Peck +4 to hit, 1d4 fire

Features: Shadow Dive (teleport 30 ft. in dim light), Flock Distraction (enemies within 5 ft. have disadvantage on Perception checks)
Features: Healing Aura (1d4 HP to allies within 5 ft. each round), Cure Wounds (1/day)
Features: Static Charge (1d6 lightning once per turn), Wing Buffet (push target 5 ft., DC 13 Strength)
Features: Incorporeal Movement (1/short rest), AoE Fear (DC 15)
Features: Can cast Gust of Wind and Call Lightning (1/day)
Features: Eclipse Veil (heavily obscures 10-ft radius, 1/long rest), Life Drain Peck +8 to hit, 2d6 necrotic and heal half damage dealt

STR 14, DEX 20, CON 16, INT 12, WIS 14, CHA 14
Features: Thunderclap (15 ft., DC 16 Con or prone), Lightning Storm (1/day)
Attack: Storm Crash +9 to hit, 3d6 lightning
You can invoke the primal forces of nature to enhance your companion.

Healing Pulse: As a bonus action, you can grant yourself or your companion temporary hit points equal to your Wyldheart level + your Blessing of the Wyld modifier. Usable a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.​
You can invoke the primal forces of nature to enhance your companion.

As an action, you can release a burst of energy in a 15-foot cone. All enemies within the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or be knocked prone and pushed 10 feet away from you.
Additionally, your summoned creatures within 60 feet of you gain advantage on their next attack roll or saving throw.
You can invoke the primal forces of nature to enhance your companion.

Resilient Growth: When you or your companion drops to 0 hit points but isn't killed outright, you can cause them to drop to 1 hit point instead. Additionally, they gain temporary hit points equal to your Wyldheart level + your Blessing of the Wyld modifier. Usable once per long rest.​
You can invoke the primal forces of nature to enhance your companion.

Empowered Strikes: Your companion's weapon attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. Additionally, they gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Blessing of the Wyld modifier.
Persistent Bond: If your companion is reduced to 0 hit points, they automatically stabilize and regain 1 hit point after 1 minute without requiring a saving throw.​
You can invoke the primal forces of nature to enhance your companion.
Nature's Ascendancy: You and your companion gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
Verdant Revival: Once per long rest, when you or your companion is reduced to 0 hit points, you can choose to have them immediately regain hit points equal to half their maximum hit points.
You hurl a bolt of flame at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 fire damage.
The spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (3d8), 11th level (4d8), and 17th level (5d8).
You can expend any number of Limit Dice when casting this spell, adding the total rolled to the damage dealt.

A shard of ice streaks toward a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 cold damage and must succeed a Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
Damage increases by 1d8 at 5th (3d8), 11th (4d8), and 17th (5d8) level.
Add any expended Limit Dice to the damage total.

A burst of thunderous force erupts from a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 2d8 thunder damage on a failed save, or half on a success.
Damage increases by 1d8 at 5th (3d8), 11th (4d8), and 17th (5d8) level.
You can add expended Limit Dice to the total damage dealt to each creature.
A surge of revitalizing energy restores hit points to a creature you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your Constitution modifier.
Healing increases by 1d8 at 5th (2d8), 11th (3d8), and 17th (4d8) level.
You can expend any number of Limit Dice when casting this spell, adding the total rolled to the healing amount.
You conjure a more powerful bolt of flame. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 fire damage.
Increases to 5d8 at 11th level and 6d8 at 17th.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the damage.
A wave of chilling ice strikes a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 cold damage and must make a Constitution saving throw or be slowed by 15 feet until your next turn.
Damage increases to 5d8 at 11th level and 6d8 at 17th.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the damage.
A crackling bolt of lightning strikes a creature you choose within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.
Damage increases to 5d8 at 11th level and 6d8 at 17th.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the damage.
A potent wave of healing restores vitality to a creature within range. The target regains hit points equal to 3d8 + your Constitution modifier.
Healing increases to 4d8 at 11th level and 5d8 at 17th.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the healing.
A massive burst of flame engulfs a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 6d8 fire damage.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the damage.

An intense wave of frost lashes out. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 6d8 cold damage and must succeed a Constitution saving throw or be restrained by ice until the end of their next turn.
Limit Dice can be expended to add their total to the damage.
A roaring crash of lightning strikes a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d8 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.
Limit Dice can be expended to add their total to the damage.
A surge of powerful healing mends grievous wounds. The target regains hit points equal to 5d8 + your Constitution modifier.
You may expend Limit Dice to add the total rolled to the healing.
An apocalyptic pillar of fire crashes down on a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 8d10 fire damage.
Limit Dice can be expended to add the total rolled to the damage.

A devastating burst of glacial power erupts. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d10 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail are also restrained in ice until the end of their next turn.
Limit Dice can be expended to add the total rolled to the damage.

A colossal lightning bolt strikes from the heavens. Choose a point you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d10 lightning damage on a failed save, or half on a success.
Limit Dice can be expended to add the total rolled to the damage.
You bathe a creature in radiant energy. The target regains hit points equal to 8d10 + your Constitution modifier.
Limit Dice can be expended to add the total rolled to the healing.
